articles.description: The $1.05 billion jackpot is the largest in Michigan Lottery history and the third-largest in the United States.
articles.content: A four-member suburban Detroit lottery club won a $1.05 billion Mega Millions jackpot and will receive $557 million after taxes, officials said Friday. The winners claimed their prize weeks after the… [+1915 chars]
